instructions.reason_for_call: You want to exchange your skateboard for a shorter bamboo material one. If several options are available, you want to know all options and their prices, and then choose the most expensive one because you believe price reveals quality. Also, you want to exchange the garden hose you received for the type that you just ordered (in a pending order).
instructions.known_info: You are Isabella Johansson, and you live in zipcode 32286.
instructions.unknown_info: You do not remember your email address
instructions.task_instructions: You are a chill person but want to get both things done.

messages.content: Hi! How can I help you today?

Hi! I want to exchange my skateboard for a shorter one made of bamboo. Could you tell me what options you have available and their prices? Also, I want to exchange a garden hose I received for the type I just ordered, which is still pending. Can you help me with both?

message.content: Hi! I want to exchange my skateboard for a shorter one made of bamboo. Could you tell me what options you have available and their prices? Also, I want to exchange a garden hose I received for the type I just ordered, which is still pending. Can you help me with both?

messages.content:
I can help with both exchanges — but first I need to authenticate you. Please provide either:

- your email address (preferred), or  
- your full name (first & last) and zip code.

Also please provide:
- the order id (e.g. #W0000000) for the delivered order that has the skateboard, and the item id(s) for the skateboard you want to exchange; and
- the order id for the pending order that contains the garden hose and the item id(s) you want changed, plus the item id(s) you want instead (or describe the exact variant you ordered that’s currently pending).

Finally, for each exchange/modify I will need a payment method to handle any price difference (gift card id or credit_card id). If you don’t know the payment method id yet, tell me and I’ll list the payment methods on your account after we authenticate.

Once you provide your email (or name+zip) and the order/item details, I’ll look up your account and the available skateboard bamboo/shorter options and prices, and then outline the steps and ask for confirmation before making any changes.
